data.text: @thatcuteDog @StephenDJury @reignitedemaust @RemindMe_OfThis Israel are advanced in their vaccination rates. https://t.co/y4gKFaFZIi

@thatcuteDog @StephenDJury @reignitedemaust @RemindMe_OfThis Long COVID is a euphemistic term for CFS/ME. 
LC/CFS can also overstimulate the vagus nerve. You can do Yoga exercise pressure points to regulate it.

What you see in the TGA stats are the effects of injuries from the jab. 
https://t.co/2v8avSq6j2

@CryptCommunique @StephenDJury @reignitedemaust @RemindMe_OfThis No. The (5)staff in my hospital who got long covid and are now incapacitated were inflicted months prior to the vaccine. Similar  in the UK.  Ive also heard some people developed similar symptoms from the vaccine. But none of our staff or patients have reported it, no one I know

@thatcuteDog @reignitedemaust Dig deep enough you will find the virus affects vagus autonomic nerves system overstimulating it which can affect all of what you have said. Nerves, heart, Gi etc. I should know. I had AF with the Novel. Cardiologist said it was secondary not heart. My vagus nerve was affected.

@CryptCommunique @reignitedemaust The data from Delta has shown an uptick of vascular heart disease in the 12 months post recovery. This is consistent world wide. I dont know if this is the case for Omicron. I hope not. I am not your enemy. Stay safe.

@CryptCommunique @reignitedemaust Omicron hasnt been as fatal as Delta. However the Immunologists are saying every infection results in T Cell damage that cannot be reversed. This means, every infection weakens your ability to fight future infections of anything. They advise to try to avoid more infections.
@thatcuteDog @reignitedemaust Also, my whole family have had it and it’s no where near as ghastly as you state. I’ve had the novel and 3 days of omicron so please don’t convince me otherwise.

@thatcuteDog @reignitedemaust Way more than what would normally be a safe level and if you think that’s ok we’ll then I’m not going to argue with stupid people because they bring you down to their level and beat you with experience. M. Twain
